name: Roll To Paradice
description:
“Roll to Paradice” is a game about rolling a die called “Diceon” by pushing their side with the corresponding number on the keyboard. The goal is to roll far away from the human tabletop mega-fan and ascend to the Paradice.

Team:

Alexander Brierly Chramer

Linda Hakanen

Fabian Hugert

Andrew Brierly Chramer

Ruben Rådelius

Walter Sonnesjö

Attributions: Sub Bass Kick Drum for moving Thump 1 https://freesound.org/people/F.M.Audio/sounds/616207/

Thump 2 https://freesound.org/people/Theriavirra/sounds/270148/

Thump 3 https://freesound.org/people/Sawuare/sounds/500926/

Sticky Jam https://freesound.org/people/MrFossy/sounds/589916/

Winning Choir https://freesound.org/people/HoBoTrails/sounds/424964/
